title: Hanastél
subtitle: A cocktail recipe app for Android
authors: Hrafnkell Baldursson, Rannveig Guðmundsdóttir, Sigurður Már Atlason
description: This Android app was a part of an android app development class in Reykjavik University. We had to come up with our own idea for an app. Our idea was an app that would list cocktail recipes that you could filter by ingredients and favorite.
